cu.explanation_en: Setting the MCC to 999 exceeds the valid range (000-999), causing PLMN configuration errors and network registration failures.

du.explanation_en: Setting the SSB per RACH occasion and CB preambles per SSB to 100 exceeds the valid range (0-15), leading to improper RACH configuration and access failures.
du.explanation_zh: 將 SSB 每 RACH 機會和 CB 每 SSB 前導碼設定為 100 超過有效範圍 (0-15)，導致 RACH 配置不當，並造成接入失敗。
